name: Red
background: A teenage courier living in a futuristic megacity, trained by her resistance leader mother in covert operations and survival; accustomed to navigating dangerous cityscapes.
motivation: To save her grandmother, deliver the secret package, and prove herself to her family and the resistance.

name: Red's Mother (Mira)
background: Leader of an underground resistance movement against the regime; experienced in espionage and urban warfare.
motivation: To overthrow the regime, protect her family, and rescue her mother (Red’s grandmother).

name: Grandmother (Dr. Lin Su)
background: A renowned cybernetic engineer forced to work on regime AI projects; has a history of resistance support.
motivation: To escape captivity, sabotage the regime’s AI, and reunite with her family.

name: Wolf
background: An advanced AI mercenary hired by the regime; known for his cunning tactics and ability to manipulate both digital and physical environments.
motivation: To complete his assignment by securing the data package and asserting his dominance over human and AI adversaries.

name: Head Scientist (Dr. Viktor Hale)
role: Head regime scientist at the lab
background: Lead scientist overseeing forced AI development at the regime lab; enforces strict control over prisoners and staff.
motivation: To advance the regime’s AI weaponization program and maintain his position of power.

name: Regime Agent (Agent Kade)
background: Mid-level operative in the regime’s security force; tasked with capturing resistance operatives and securing sensitive data.
motivation: To apprehend Red and prevent resistance sabotage.

name: Patrol Drone (Drone Unit 17)
background: Standard-issue drone used by the regime to monitor city borders and enforce security.
motivation: To detect and detain individuals carrying contraband or resistance material.
